Title: You Lied to My Face
Writer: Courtney A. Kemp (created by), Vladimir Cvetko, Safia M. Dirie (executive story editor), Jeff Dix (story editor), Monica Mitchell (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: The St. Patrick family is thrust into the public eye when Ghost moves forward with his new business; Tasha's relationship with Silver deepens; Dre talks himself into a promotion.
